title: ‘Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare III’ Beta Impressions: One Huge Problem Could Kill This Game
description: The Modern Warfare III beta is a bit of a mess. It's a fun, but obviously super rushed, game that underscores all the weaknesses at Sledgehammer Games.

title: Forget The MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Much Better
description: Apple has plans for a smart upgrade to the current MacBook Pro, you might want to wait before buying a new laptop.

title: Generative AI Unleashed: Charting The Enterprise Future
description: Generative AI is rapidly emerging and represents a turning point for businesses in nearly every industry.  Article offers a blueprint for leaders to ride this wave.

title: Is The ‘Mouth-Taping’ TikTok Trend A Real Sleep Hack? Here Are Caveats
description: Some TikTokers have been advocating taping your mouth shut while sleeping so that you are forced to breathe through your nose rather than your mouth.

title: 3 Reasons You Should Never Resurrect A ‘Relationship Zombie’
description: Emotional dissonance comes with the territory of being ghosted. But engaging when a ghost reaches out again may not be the salve one hopes for.

title: Yayoi Kusama's Psychedelic Infinity Mirror Rooms Trip Through SFMOMA
description: This marks the first time the Japanese artist's famous immersive spaces have swung through the San Francisco Bay Area.

title: Destiny 2’s Xur Has Legitimately Good Loot This Weekend
description: I genuinely cannot remember the last time I wrote a “go visit Xur” article for Destiny 2, but the man(?) has gone wild this week with some offerings that really cannot be missed, including one ultra-rare, max exotic.

title: A Rumored Smaller Atreus ‘God Of War’ Game Sounds Great
description: An Atreus game makes a lot of sense, both narratively and gameplay-wise. God of War had large sections of the game where you played as Atreus, a “bow main,” as it were, with bonus mystic powers including actually transforming into a bear.

title: Naughty Dog, Do Not Remaster ‘The Last Of Us Part II,’ Come On
description: There are now rumblings that Naughty Dog’s next project, in addition to its flailing Last of Us Factions multiplayer game, is a remaster of The Last of Us Part II.

title: Diablo 4’s Microtransaction Cosmetic Issues Will Remain In Season 2, It Seems
description: Diablo 4 famously did a whole blog post about how its in-game armor sets would be just as cool as the store ones. This was largely true at launch. This has been the opposite of true for seasons, and that appears to include season 2 now.

title: Returning To ‘Redfall’ After Its Big New Update, Is It Worth It?
description: Five months later, Arkane did indeed deliver its promised 60fps update for Redfall, along with a lot of fixes and changes to try to make it play better.

title: Exclusive: FBI Hunts School ‘Swatter’ Who Sent A Bomb Hoax To Sandy Hook
description: FBI identifies suspect in Riverside, California, who targeted elementary schools, suicide help lines and Nashville Airport. It comes after a barrage of “swatting” calls has caused chaos across America.

title: Current Climate: The Pope Urges The World To Solve Climate Change
description: This week’s Current Climate, which every Saturday brings you the latest news about the business of sustainability.

title: Nobel Prize Goes To Scientists Who Paved The Way For Covid-19 Vaccine
description: Drs. Kariko and Weissman’s decades of perseverance paved the way for the technology needed to combat and pull the world out of the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Haitian-American Woman Dr. Claudine Gay Is New Harvard President
description: She was inaugurated to lead the university with the largest endowment in the world, an endowment that is more than twice the GDP of her parents’ homeland of Haiti

title: Apple iPhone 15, iPhone 15 Pro Overheating Fix: Images Reveal Amazing Effect
